items: Start by lying face down on a mat or comfortable surface.
Extend your arms straight out in front of you and your legs straight behind you.
Simultaneously lift your right arm and left leg off the ground as high as you can, while keeping your torso and hips on the ground.
Hold this position for a few seconds, then lower your arm and leg back down to the ground.
Repeat the same movement with your left arm and right leg.
Continue alternating between lifting your right arm and left leg, and your left arm and right leg, for the desired number of repetitions.
Strengthens lower back muscles
Improves posture
Engages core muscles
Increases stability and balance
Can be done anywhere without equipment
Erector spinae
Gluteus maximus
Hamstrings
Quadriceps
Abdominals
Superman
Alternating Superman with opposite arm and leg raised
Superman with both arms and legs raised
Superman with one arm and opposite leg raised
Superman with one arm and same side leg raised
